column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I made sure to look up the train schedule in advance to make sure I knew which train I needed to check .
#text=Then , I went a day early to purchase my tickets to made sure I had them , since this was not a trip I made every day .
#text=On the day of my trip , I checked the schedule to make sure there were no delays or cancellations .
#text=I made sure to arrive at the train station at least 10 minutes early , with all my bags and luggage .
#text=I boarded the train and greeted the conductor and showed him my ticket .
#text=Then , I picked a spot that was open and sat down quietly .
#text=Since this train had many stops , I needed to be aware of when my stop was coming up so I would not miss it .
#text=As my stop approached , I pressed the stop request button and started to get up .
#text=Once the train stopped , I wished the conductor a nice day and got off the train .
